sources.title: The Man from Hell's Edges
sources.description: Title: The Man from Hell's Edges Summary: A cowboy after the man that killed his father goes to prison to get in with his gang. Directed by: Robert N. Bradbury Actors: Production Company: Trem Carr Pictures Release Date: 15 June 1932 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Williams goes to prison to become friends of the robbers that killed his father. Breaking out he learns that Lobo is the one he is after. With the help of Shamrock and Half Pint he goes after Lobo and his gang.

sources.title: The Man from Hell's Edges (1932) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Rare Cowboy Western discovered in the PizzaFLIX archive!
Starring: Bob Steele, Nancy Drexel, and Gabby Hayes
Directed By: Robert N. Bradbury

To avenge his father's death, Flash Manning (Bob Steele) gets sent to Hell's Edges penitentiary where he believes the men responsible were sentenced.

metadata.Plot: Williams goes to prison to become friends of the robbers that killed his father. Breaking out he learns that Lobo is the one he is after. With the help of Shamrock and Half Pint he goes after Lobo and his gang.
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Nancy Drexel, Julian Rivero
